column1: Q4 - Which of the following social media have you used in the past three months?
You will be asked a series of 26 questions about each social media you select. Approximate timings are as follows:
1-4 social media: 10 minutes
4-8 social media: 15 minutes
8-12 social media: 20 minutes
C1 - I see positive conversation (ex. Friendly chit chat, education, humor) on the platform.
C2 - I see negative conversation (ex. Disputes, name-calling, trolling) on the platform.
C3 - I see perspectives and opinions that are different from my own on the platform.
C4 - The platform prioritizes my friends’ posts over other posts.
C5 - The platform prioritizes sponsored posts over other posts.
C6 - I see two-way discussion between content creators and audiences on the platform.
C7 - It is easy to make new friends on the platform.
S1 - The users I interact with feel like individual human beings.
S2 - The platform encourages me to present an identity.
S3 - The persona I present on the platform is authentic.
S4 - The platform enables me to customize my profile.
S5 - I spend time viewing and curating my own profile.
D1 - I see posts by small creators.
D2 - On average, how long do you spend in a single session on the platform?
